mapper.update:
update t_ctd_data_records
voyage_number=#{voyageNumber},
ship_name=#{shipName},
platform_type=#{platformType},
platform_name=#{platformName},
station_num=#{stationNum},
start_time=#{startTime},
finish_time=#{finishTime},
dive_num=#{diveNum},
longitude_layout=#{longitudeLayout},
latitude_layout=#{latitudeLayout},
depth_layout=#{depthLayout},
longitude_work=#{longitudeWork},
latitude_work=#{latitudeWork},
depth_work=#{depthWork},
dev_type = #{devType},
dev_model=#{devModel},
dev_sn=#{devSn},
data_format=#{dataFormat},
data_status=#{dataStatus},
data_file_name=#{dataFileName},
del_flag=#{delFlag},
where data_set_sn=#{dataSetSn}
update t_ctd_data_records set del_flag = 1, data_file_name = substring(rand(),3) where data_set_sn = #{dataSetSn}

update t_ctd_data_records set del_flag = 1, data_file_name = substring(rand(),3) where data_set_sn in
#{dataSetSn}
mapper.select: select t.data_set_sn AS 'dataSetSn', t.voyage_number AS 'voyageNumber', t.ship_name AS 'shipName', t.platform_type AS 'platformType', t.platform_name AS 'platformName', t.station_num AS 'stationNum', t.start_time AS 'startTime', t.finish_time AS 'finishTime', t.dive_num AS 'diveNum', t.longitude_layout AS 'longitudeLayout', t.latitude_layout AS 'latitudeLayout', t.depth_layout AS 'depthLayout', t.longitude_work AS 'longitudeWork', t.latitude_work AS 'latitudeWork', t.depth_work AS 'depthWork', t.dev_model AS 'devModel', t.dev_sn AS 'devSn', t.data_format AS 'dataFormat', t.data_status AS 'dataStatus', t.data_file_name AS 'dataFileName', t.dev_type AS 'devType' , t.del_flag AS 'delFlag' from t_ctd_data_records t where data_set_sn = #{dataSetSn}

select t.data_set_sn AS 'dataSetSn', t.voyage_number AS 'voyageNumber', t.ship_name AS 'shipName', t.platform_type AS 'platformType', t.platform_name AS 'platformName', t.station_num AS 'stationNum', t.start_time AS 'startTime', t.finish_time AS 'finishTime', t.dive_num AS 'diveNum', t.longitude_layout AS 'longitudeLayout', t.latitude_layout AS 'latitudeLayout', t.depth_layout AS 'depthLayout', t.longitude_work AS 'longitudeWork', t.latitude_work AS 'latitudeWork', t.depth_work AS 'depthWork', t.dev_model AS 'devModel', t.dev_sn AS 'devSn', t.data_format AS 'dataFormat', t.data_status AS 'dataStatus', t.data_file_name AS 'dataFileName', t.dev_type AS 'devType' , t.del_flag AS 'delFlag' from t_ctd_data_records t where del_flag = 0 and data_set_sn in
#{dataSetSn}

select data_set_sn from t_ctd_data_records where data_set_sn in
#{item.dataSetSn}

select data_set_sn from t_ctd_data_records where data_file_name in
#{item.dataFileName}
